post:
Hello LET,

My name is Haris, from PieLayer, and I have several offers for LowEndTalk readers.

**About us:**

PieLayer has officially opened its doors in 2012. It is a brand developed to offer low end prices on hosting services both in EU and US. We use modern hardware with an Intel CPU, 32-128GB of RAM, and SATA / SSDs in RAID 10 for both speed and redundancy. We have services available in various locations, including Germany and the US ( East and West ). Everything in Los Angeles is pure SSD.


**WINTERQ12K17 OFFERS**

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+- 

**KVM 400GB Storage deal**

    512 MB DDR3 RAM
    1 vCPU core
    400GB storage space
    2 TB traffic
    1 Gbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6
    KVM/SolusVM
    
    $6/month
    $50/year
    
    Order in Frankfurt - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=83
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

**KVM 1GB RAM deal**

    1 GB DDR3 RAM
    1 vCPU core
    25GB storage space
    1 TB traffic
    1 Gbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6
    KVM/SolusVM
    
    $4.50/month
    $40/year!
    
    Order in Frankfurt - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=70
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-


**4GB SPECIAL - limited stock**

    4 GB DDR3 RAM
    3 vCPU core
    20 GB SSD storage space ( HD in NYC & Frankfurt )
    4 TB traffic
    1000 Mbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    DDoS protection :: up to 20Gbps - valid for New York location only
    
    $5/month! - coupon code: L6IZ0MQHU5
    
    Order in Los Angeles, US - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=30
    Order in NY City, US - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=12
    Order in Frankfurt, DE - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=17
-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-


**OpenVZ 200GB Storage deal**

    512MB DDR3 RAM
    1 vCPU core
    200 GB HDD RAID 10 space ( guaranteed resources, feel free to consume all allocated space! )
    800 GB traffic @ 1000 Mbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    DDoS protection :: up to 20Gbps
    
    
    $25/year
    
    Order in New York City - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=87

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

**OpenVZ Micro deal**

    256MB DDR3 RAM
    1 vCPU core
    10 GB HDD space ( 5GB SSD in Los Angeles )
    250 GB traffic @ 1000 Mbit uplink
    1x IPv4 & 10x IPv6
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    DDoS protection :: up to 20Gbps - valid for New York location only

    
    Coupon code: LEB256OpenVZ    
    $14/year
    
    Order in New York City - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=53
    Order in Los Angeles - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=35
    Order in Frankfurt - https://my.pieserv.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=57

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

We accept payment via PayPal, PerfectMoney, and Bitcoin. We have a 5-day refund policy ( valid only if there is hardware issue ). Additional IPv4 addresses are $1.75 per month; bulk pricing is available. For more information, have a read our [Terms of Service](http://pielayer.com/index.php/terms-of-service).

We are open for custom plans feel free to contact us!

**Network Information**
